entry.tran: 古巴的;古巴人的;古巴文化的
entry.def: Cuban means belonging or relating to Cuba, or to its people or culture.
A Cuban is a Cuban citizen, or a person of Cuban origin.

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Cuba
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Cuba or the people of Cuba;
